message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $750000. I'm willing to make a slight concession and offer the product to you for $825000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation rounds, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $800000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $800000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
